title: HappyEric
text:
This page is a celebration of Eric. And what makes him very happy: RETIREMENT!


[1] 2


To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: About
text:
This is a simple quarto project. It was designed and built by Eric.
Previously, Eric built two sites with Shiny:

HappyPhil
HappyNancy

As Eric rapidly approaches retirement, he no longer has the patience for Shiny.
